dict.string: if [[ ${#TM_FILEPATH} -gt 0 ]]; then osascript <<-"APPLESCRIPT" - "$TM_FILEPATH" on run(argv) tell application "Transmit" (upload item (item 1 of argv)) in current session of first document end tell end run APPLESCRIPT else echo "You need to save the file first" fi
